hero.title: Hi, I'm Radin
hero.description:
Senior Software Engineer with a strong background in backend development,
 cloud solutions, and data engineering.
 I help businesses scale, innovate, and achieve their goals through technology.
 Passionate about mentoring and leading teams toward success.
 Currently based in Berlin, working at BAUHAUS.

items.subtitle: Experienced Data/Software Engineer
items.description: BAUHAUS is one of the biggest E-Commerce companies in the Europe. I worked in the Pricing team, where I was responsible for the pricing of the products.

items.subtitle: Software Engineer
items.description: momox is one of the leading Re-commerce companies in the Europe. I worked in the Pricing/Marketing team. I was responsible for the pricing of the products and also managing the Google Ads campaigns.

items.subtitle: Senior Software/Data Engineer
items.description: Sheypoor is one of the lead classifieds marketplaces in Iran with over 20M users. I worked in the Data team where I was responsible for the data pipelines and also the data warehouse.

items.subtitle: Senior Software Engineer
items.description: I worked in the ParsData Company's fintech startup called Diver. I was responsible for the entire designation and implementation of the Backend system.

items.subtitle: Software Engineer
items.description: Parspooyesh Fanavar is a Telecom company. They offer accounting systems to internet providers. They have more than 10 million network clients and subscribers. I worked in the IT department of the company and was responsible for different projects and dashboards.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description:
I'm always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities.
 Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!
